shared_text:
Seton Education Partners
April 1 at 12:37 PM Â·

What does #LivingHope look like? It looks like Reyes Claudio, mother of 4 and senior director of operations for Brilla Public Charter Schools working til 9 p.m. on a Friday Night equipping more than 650 families in the South Bronx with computers, books, internet and essential supplies amidst the closing of schools this month...and then staying up to feed her 4-week-old baby throughout the night.

Living Hope is Reyes, along with her school-based operations team, serving with a deep sense of JOY. She was where she was meant to be, where she was neededâ€”comforting others during a time of great fear.

Learn more about Reyesâ€™ story of #LivingHope here: https://www.setonpartners.org/news/living-hope/mott-haven/
